"Get the ultra clean and revitalized feeling with NIVEA Men Active Clean Shower Gel. This innovative 3-in-1 shower gel is meant for your body, face and hair.

longDesc: Use 125 gm bar of Dettol Skincare bathing soap to get the most cost-effective germ protection every day with proven care for your skin ensured by DERMATOLOGICALLY TESTED formula of pure glycerin and Trichlorocarbon that keeps your skin soft and smooth. Dettol Skincare is a Grade 1 bathing soap- providing the best value for your purchase. Recommended by Doctors of Bangladesh Private Medical Practitioners Association (BPMPA).
